results.content: ce cours est très bien explique et les différents projets sont excellents pour bien comprendre la technique ajax. je recommande vivement ce cours  a tous ceux qui veulent apprendre cette technique. Merci énormément et encore félicitations.

results.content: Content is what I expected. Instructor takes necessary time to articulate concepts and I like the demonstration. The flow is progressive and builds logically. I like that he writes some comments in the files it helps to follow when we miss a word.
results.content_html: Content is what I expected. Instructor takes necessary time to articulate concepts and I like the demonstration. The flow is progressive and builds logically. I like that he writes some comments in the files it helps to follow when we miss a word.

results.content: The overall content of the course was helpful and great. I think there were a few times that the course could have been fine tuned where there was an error or mistake made and had to go back to fix a few lines of code. Overall I would recommend the course though to learn AJAX and PHP together.
results.content_html: The overall content of the course was helpful and great. I think there were a few times that the course could have been fine tuned where there was an error or mistake made and had to go back to fix a few lines of code. Overall I would recommend the course though to learn AJAX and PHP together.

results.content: Basic Ajax is explained well although, I gave 3 stars due to lack of resources, slightly poor audio, it is not that detailed as I expected and the "how to display the country, state & city in a form" was not discussed. Other than that, the overall course is good and I recommend it for beginners.
results.content_html: Basic Ajax is explained well although, I gave 3 stars due to lack of resources, slightly poor audio, it is not that detailed as I expected and the "how to display the country, state & city in a form" was not discussed. Other than that, the overall course is good and I recommend it for beginners.

results.content: This is great!  Amazing course with in depth tutorial and explanation for free.  I have been looking for where to learn AJax with PHP. I am so happy and surprise I come across this one for free. Thank you so much  Vivek Vengala. God bless you for giving back your knowledge to help others. You are really changing the world.
